name: protuberance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that sticks out from a surface: If the plant has been infected you will see dark protuberances along the stems.
medical
  specialized a projection or swelling on a part of the body such as the chin or the eyebrow: Bunions are bony protuberances that stick out on either side of the foot.
